description: The GoFlex™ Net media sharing device allows you to share your digital life         with anyone, anywhere. With two integrated GoFlex ultra-portable drive slots and         one additional USB 2.0 port, you can pair GoFlex ultra-portable drives or any other         USB 2.0 storage device with the GoFlex Net to store and access your content from         any networked computer in the home. Following service activation, you can access         your content remotely through a clean, web-based interface and invite friends to         view your files or upload as well. Simply type in their email addresses and they         will receive an email linked to the folders you chose to share with them.
title: Seagate STAK100 FreeAgent GoFlex Net Media Sharing Device
